    Support FAQ

    search_support.Rd

    Search support FAQ articles.

    search_support(search_text, elanguage = NULL, paginate = TRUE, max_pages = Inf)

    Arguments

    search_text

    Search text to match FAQ articles by.

    paginate

    If TRUE, paginates through the results. Some methods provide data access in digestible chunks and do not return all available information at once. The paginate automatically retrieves all pages until max_pages is reached.

    max_pages

    Maximum number of pages to paginate. Ignored if paginate is FALSE. Defaults to Inf such that all available data are paginated.

    Examples

    # get help articles on portal 2
search_support("portal 2")
#> # A tibble: 14 × 5
#>    articleid           name                      content clan_accountid url_code

# get help articles on purchases
search_support("purchase")
#> # A tibble: 103 × 5
#>    articleid           name                      content clan_accountid url_code

# get localized articles in french
search_support("purchase", elanguage = 2)
